items.sentence: They fell in love the moment their eyes met.
This TV program is really quite interesting.
I don\'t even remember what Tom looked like.
I don\'t know how much those two bikes cost.
You are even more beautiful than I remember.
I wish I had eaten lunch before I came here.
I wish I had had the chance to learn French.
I wish I had the courage to do what Tom did.
Tom is in the parking lot, waiting for Mary.
Tom is never going to come back here, is he?
I didn\'t know what to do until Tom told me.
I didn\'t realize you and Tom were so close.
We\'ll cross that bridge when we come to it.
We\'ll furnish you with everything you need.
We\'ll try to be more careful the next time.
I plan to tell Tom that I don\'t want to go.
Tom gave Mary a kiss and got out of the car.
Tom gave me everything except what I wanted.
What really interests me a lot is astronomy.
Are you going to eat dinner at home tonight?
